					<div class="large-1 user-pull-avatar">

					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
	{{/if}}
</div>

			
		</div>

	C1800.6,1062.1,1760.7,1062.1,1720.7,1062.4z"/>
</svg>
</div>				<h2>Introducing streaming music powered by TIDAL</h2>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="cell large-12 tidal-advert-bottom">

    </div>
  );
}
